name: MAW Consulting Michal Wilkolek
goal:
Provide technical and business advisory into shipping companies and related industries.
Firm is dedicated to provide complex and customer orientated solutions which meet top standards and are based on solid expertise and with information transparency.
Firm's goal is to built and retain environmental and social awareness of customers by promoting those values by own example and by provided advices.
interests: Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: The policy on monitoring, reporting and verification of CO2 emissions from maritime transport Regulation (EU) 757/2015
